benchmark_details.name: CoSpace (Continuous Space Perception Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: CoSpace is a multi-image visual understanding benchmark designed to assess the Continuous Space perception ability for Vision-Language Models (VLMs), comprising 2,918 images and 1,626 question-answer pairs across seven tasks to evaluate spatial reasoning and multi-image perception.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the continuous space perception ability of vision-language models through multi-image understanding tasks.

data.source: Images collected from Baidu Map Panorama API and the HM3D dataset.
data.annotation: Generated by GPT-4o and verified by human annotators.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation metrics are calculated based on the correctness of answers provided by models compared to ground truths.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in understanding continuous visual space.
methodology.baseline_results: Average human performance across tasks was significantly higher than the best model scores.
methodology.validation: Validated through manual review and comparisons with human annotators.
